CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1950, pg. 17, reads: "Biggest Crowd in History Sees Homer Brown Take Oath as Judge - Proud of Dad - Mrs. Homer S. Brown and Byrd Brown, son of the new judge, show their happiness after Judge Brown had taken the oath Tuesday morning.... - Photos by Smith and Harris"
TitMainTitle: Wilhelmina Byrd Brown, Judge Homer S. Brown, and Byrd Brown standing in courtroom, for Brown's investiture ceremony
